title: Twitter’s new feature to distinguish ‘Good Bots’ from the bad is out for everyone
content:
Back in September 2021, Twitter announced a new way to identify “Good Bots,” which are accounts with automated tweets that offer legitimate content. Although this feature was only available for some accounts, the social network is now rolling out the Good Bot label to all users around the world.

more…

The post Twitter’s new feature to distinguish ‘Good Bots’ from the bad is out for everyone appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Twitter is now rolling out "Good Bots" labels to all users around the world so they can identify accounts with automated tweets.
